questions.question: What is the predominant color of the table and chairs?
What appears to be the primary material used in construction?
Considering the size and design, what is the intended use of this furniture set?
Describe the overall shape of the tabletop; is it rectangular or square?
Focusing on the chairs, what is the style of their backrest?
What seems to be the texture of the table's surface; is it glossy or matte?
How many chairs are included in this furniture set?
Describe the legs of the table; are they straight or tapered?
Observing the chairs, are the seats and backs attached or separate?
Does the table have any visible decorative elements or carvings?
What is the approximate height of the chairs relative to the table?
Judging from the image, is the set assembled or unassembled?
Considering the image, what is the general condition of the furniture set?
Describe the visible joints of the furniture; are they simple or complex?
Based solely on visual inspection, does the finish appear smooth or rough?
